name: Time Keeper (Ruan Palmeira)
description:
Help the Time Keeper to fix the flow of time by collecting the time segments that are scattered across the forest. Each time segment gives you an extra 2 seconds to help your return to the time hourglass before it's too late.

Game developed for the Happy Code's Digital Games Development Course.

Controls:
  • Movement: (Left Arrow and Right Arrow) or (A and D).
  • Space: Jump.
Credits: Backgrounds:
  • Free Halloween 2D Game Backgrounds - CraftPix.net
  • Free Horizontal 2D Game Backgrounds - CraftPix.net
